creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The Java Samplers do not process configuration defaults correctly.

If there is a Java configuration element present, then all the values are taken 
from that, and none of the sampler values have any effect.

There is a work-round - don't use the Java config elements - but this is not 
ideal, hence the severity.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
This is now fixed in current CVS. Note there's a related GUI bug that still
prevents using Java Config elements comfortably, but since the problem is, in
that case, highly visual to the user, I will create a new, lower-priority bug
for it.
*** Bug 27114 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: sebb@apache.org
